ryad.games.ergoengine.components
Class MovementComponent

java.lang.Object
  ryad.games.ergoengine.GameComponent
      ryad.games.ergoengine.components.MovementComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener
public class MovementComponent
extends GameComponent

Author:
Jason Welch A simple movement component. Moves the game object based on it's velocity and time, while applying friction to slow it down. to do: make friction values configurable!
